pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Hello world docker actionThis action prints "Hello World" or "Hello" + the name of a person to greet to the log.## Inputs## `who-to-greet`**Required** The name of the person to greet. Default `"World"`.## Outputs## `time`The time we greeted you.## Example usageuses: actions/hello-world-docker-action@v2with: who-to-greet: 'Mona the Octocat'
